snippet.title: Woman attacked in Hunter home invasion
snippet.content: A woman is recovering in hospital after she was bashed during a violent home invasion in Singleton The woman, 42, was attacked by a man and a woman, who is known to the victim, after they forced their way into her home at about 9pm on Monday. She managed to get help from a neighbour and is in hospital with facial fractures in a serious but stable condition. (C) AAP 2017
